Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is visible, centered horizontally with its parent, has background color rgb(255,165,0), text color #FFFFFF, font size 16px, font weight 600, padding 12px 24px, border radius 4px
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button becomes focused with a 2px solid blue border on interaction
Verify the 'Products' navigation link has text color #333333, font family 'Arial', font size 14px, height 40px, width 100px, positioned at x: 200px, y: 10px upon page load
Verify the 'Products' navigation link active state background changes to #EEEEEE with a border bottom of 2px solid #007bff over a 300ms transition

Verify the 'Email address' input field has placeholder text 'your.email@example.com', width 300px, height 40px, border 1px solid #CCCCCC, font size 14px, margin-bottom 10px, aria-label 'Email input for user login'
Verify the 'Email address' input field disabled opacity is 0.6 and background color is #F0F0F0

Verify the main product image loads from 'https://cdn.example.com/product/large/item123.jpg', has natural dimensions 800x600px, rendered dimensions 500x375px, alt text 'Blue denim jeans, front view', loads within 1.5s, its top-left corner is at x: 50px, y: 100px, with a small 'new' watermark at its top-right corner
Verify the video player is visible, width 720px, height 480px, positioned at top 20px, left 20px, initially muted, offers a fullscreen option, with a 500ms fade-in animation on load
Verify the 'Success' modal dialog overlay background color is rgba(0,0,0,0.7)

Verify the 'Success' modal dialog box appears with width 400px, height 250px, border radius 8px, padding 20px, left 50%, top 50%, and contains text 'Item added to cart successfully' with font size 20px, text align center

Verify the product table displays exactly 5 rows of data, each row having height 50px, alternating background colors #F9F9F9 and #FFFFFF, a 1px solid #DDD border, and 'Price' column text uses font weight 700, color #E44D26, aligned right

Verify the 'Status message' element becomes visible within 300ms upon form submission, has background #28A745, text color #FFFFFF, font size 14px, padding 10px, border radius 4px, left 20px, top 20px, and displays text 'Your information has been saved successfully.' for 5 seconds
Verify the search results header shows '123 results' with font weight 700, font size 24px, color #333333, positioned at x: 15px, y: 10px
Verify the search results list has total height 600px, scroll-top value 0 initially, margin-top 20px
Click the 'Language' dropdown
Verify the 'Language' dropdown becomes active, appears at x: 50px, y: 100px, has width 150px, border 1px solid #999999, background color #FFFFFF, lists 3 options, each with text size 14px
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify a tooltip becomes visible after 200ms, positioned 10px below the icon and centered horizontally, with background color #333333, text color #FFFFFF, font size 12px, padding 8px, border radius 3px, and displays text 'Contact support for assistance'
Verify the footer link 'Privacy Policy' is visible, has text content 'Privacy Policy', font size 13px, color #666666, value 'https://www.example.com/privacy', located at bottom 10px, left 20px
Verify the footer link 'Privacy Policy' changes to color #007bff on hover with a 200ms transition

Verify the hero banner image has source 'https://cdn.example.com/hero.webp', is loaded successfully, has rendered dimensions 1200x400px, alt text 'Smiling couple shopping online', positioned at top 0px, left 0px, uses a cover style for alignment, with a 1px solid #DDD border
Verify the progress bar is visible, has width 500px, height 10px, background color #E0E0E0, left 10px, top 10px, container border radius 5px
Verify the progress bar inner bar shows 75% completion, colored #007bff, with a 200ms width transition
Verify the pagination control displays exactly 5 page numbers, each button having width 30px, height 30px, margin-right 5px
Verify the pagination control '3' button is active, has background color #007bff, text color #FFFFFF, font size 14px, border radius 3px

Verify the user profile avatar image has source 'https://cdn.example.com/avatars/user_123.png', is circular shape with border radius 50%, has rendered dimensions 50x50px, alt text 'User profile picture', loads within 500ms, located at x: 20px, y: 20px, with a 2px solid #EEE border

Verify the 'New Message' notification pop-up is visible for 3s, has background color #FFC107, text color #333333, font size 16px, font weight 500, padding 15px, border radius 5px, positioned at top 20px and right 20px, and disappears with an animation over 400ms

Verify the interactive map component has width 800px, height 600px, is visible, positioned at left 10px, top 10px, central marker at coordinates (x: 400, y: 300) with a custom icon, initially shows zoom level 10, with aria-label 'Interactive store location map'
Verify the date picker input field shows today's date as its value in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format, placeholder 'Select a Date', is enabled, has font size 15px, width 180px, height 35px
Verify the date picker input field focused state border color changes to #007bff with 1px thickness over a 150ms transition

Verify the scrollable content area has maximum height 400px, width 100%, scroll-top value 0 initially, positioned at x: 10px, y: 10px, and its inner content uses font family 'Lato', font size 16px, text color #444444, padding 15px, and a 1px solid #E0E0E0 border
